TopicTitle: Re-entry heating effects/mach effects causing massive stutter

Articles.Content:
System specs:

Win 7 ultimate

Athlon II X2 270 3.2 GHz dual-core PC

AMD R7 240 2GB GPU

8GB RAM

I have a modded install but I've uninstalled all mods and get the exact same problem, so it's a deal with the base game. When flying SSTOs as their ascent profile requires significant time in the upper atmosphere, you often get the "re-entry" effects when throttling up. When this happens, I get a massive stutter. Not just a framerate drop, but a period of 1 second of 60fps and then 1 second of lockup. Repeat ad infinitum until one is out of the atmosphere or until frustration. Not running -force-openGL, but I could if that would help.

Please provide your logs Kristopher, the stickies show where to find them, we may need your dxdiag as well, your settings.cfg and the craft file you are using ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I'll give all that--but I thought logs only did good when there were crashes...I'm not crashing, just having performance issues.
